newsitem.title: ARGENTINA: SOCCER-DEPORTIVO ESPANOL'S MARTIN VARGAS TESTS POSITIVE.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-DEPORTIVO ESPANOL'S MARTIN VARGAS TESTS POSITIVE.

text.p: Deportivo Espanol's Martin Vargas tested positive for drugs two months ago, a spokesman for Diego Maradona's club Bocca Juniors said on Wednesday.

Ivan Pavlovsky told reporters at the Buenos Aires ground of Argentina's most famous club that a police drug squad had raided Boca Juniors, the Argentina Football Association and a sports training centre where match drug tests are examined.
He said the police had been interested in the records of tests two months ago on Maradona, who was banned for 15 months after testing positive at the 1994 U.S. World Cup and Vargas.
The test on Maradona, who recently spent 10 days at a Swiss drugs clinic, was negative but Vargas tested positive.
